m_szDocTitle: These technologies are driving the cars of the future
m_szDocSumamry: By Jennifer Harrison, Science Officer March 4, 2016 The history of car development has mostly been about the evolution of the engine and the aesthetics. Cars are always becoming faster, more efficient, and their designs change with the times. Although most progress has related to how well a car drives, new technologies have worked their way into features that are becoming commonplace.
